Mr. Richard Drew joined Bluepoint Solutions in January of 2002 as Sr. VP, Business Development. He is responsible for the companyâ€™s product marketing and communications initiatives. He brings a stellar track record of dozens of successful product launches to the table.

Prior to joining Bluepoint, Mr. Drew enjoyed a distinguished career with Niakwa Inc. a developer of software development tools that are in use by over 500,000 end-users world wide. Mr. Drew served Niakwa as Vice President of Sales and Marketing, General Manager and President. Under his leadership Niakwa grew from a local VAR to an internationally recognized software developer.
